title: Black screen
body:
Hello, I just got a new laptop a m18x r2 Alienware
2.8ghz befor over clock, 32 gb ram, when I play league of legends work for atleas five mins then screen blacks out. Can hear it but can't see, so I googled it it's a common problem, I've tried over 12 YouTube videos nothing works, reinstalled 7 times, reinstalled Windows twice, league is only game black screening, any other game runs perfect

replies.body:
Install Direct X, VCREDIST AIO INSTALLER, Uninstall AlphaUI/HivemindUI, update drivers, update windows, turn off unneccesary programs.
Drivers: http://www.dell.com/support/home/us/en/04/product-support/product/alienware-m18x-r2/drivers
Direct X: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/179113
VCredist AIO: http://ricktendo.info/Repack/VBCRedist_AIO_x86_x64.7z
Update Windows: http://windows.microsoft.com/en-au/windows-vista/install-windows-updates
Turn off unneccesary programs: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7tUvonRlGTM https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yc7rgOxrOtY

Hope I could help
thanks cuzzy ill try now, and what do u mean update windows?
how do i get windows 10? could u link me
He doesn't mean install a newer OS, he just means install its regular updates. Which operating system are you running?

windows 7 74 bit 
i did everything he said still black screens
try updating to windows 10. I'm running windows 10 with latest drivers. (Alienware Alpha i3)
